Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Accuracy of cost analyses performed throughout the product lifecycle, including development, production, and maintenance.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Number of Accurate Cost Analyses / Total Number of Cost Analyses * 100

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Variation between planned and actual duration of each stage in the product lifecycle.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Average Duration of Lifecycle Stages - Planned Duration / Planned Duration

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.KPIS: Return on investment (ROI) by product lifecycle stage.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Financial return measured at different stages of the product lifecycle, calculated by comparing benefits to costs.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: (Net Profit from Stage / Cost of Stage) * 100

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Rate of reduction in environmental impacts associated with the product lifecycle through improvements and efficiencies.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: (Previous Environmental Impact - Current Environmental Impact) / Previous Environmental Impact * 100

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.KPIS: Customer satisfaction at different lifecycle stages.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Satisfaction levels of customers measured at various stages of the product lifecycle, including pre-purchase, usage, and post-purchase.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Average Customer Satisfaction Scores at Various Stages

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.KPIS: Time to market by lifecycle stage.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Average time required to move a product from conception to market release at each lifecycle stage.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Average Time from Concept to Market for Each Lifecycle Stage

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Efficiency of transitioning between different stages of the product lifecycle, measured by time, cost, and smoothness of transitions.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: (Number of Successful Transitions / Total Number of Transitions) * 100

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Analysis of trends in profitability throughout different stages of the product lifecycle.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Analysis of Profit Trends Across Different Lifecycle Stages
